Experience

{{employerName}}, {{jobTitle}}{{employmentDates}}

  • Achieved 100% of sales goals each month, consistently ranking among top 10 performers within district
  • Recommend appropriate account services to customers based on financial situation and communicate benefits to achieve 15-20 new accounts per month
  • Assist bank customers with opening and closing accounts, including issuing debit cards and personal checks
  • Resolved claims of fraudulent purchases on customer accounts and advised customers on increased security practices
